libshapedraw.shape

Interface XrayShape

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GLUCylinder, GLUDisk, GLUPartialDisk, GLUShape, GLUSphere, WireframeCuboid, WireframeLine, WireframeLines, WireframeLinesBlend, WireframeLinesBlendIterable, WireframeShape

    public interface XrayShape
    A Shape that supports "xray" rendering: sections of the shape that are occluded by another object can be drawn regardless, using a different color (often the same color with reduced transparency) than non-occluded sections.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double SECONDARY_ALPHA
      A recommended alpha scaling factor to apply when making a secondary color based on the main color.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReadonlyColor getMainColorReadonly() 
      ReadonlyColor getSecondaryColorReadonly() 
      boolean isVisibleThroughTerrain() 

    • Field Detail

      • SECONDARY_ALPHA

        static final double SECONDARY_ALPHA
        A recommended alpha scaling factor to apply when making a secondary color based on the main color. In other words, how much to reduce the transparency of the secondary color.

        This isn't obligatory. The secondary color does not necessarily have to be based on the main color.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getMainColorReadonly

        ReadonlyColor getMainColorReadonly()

      • getSecondaryColorReadonly

        ReadonlyColor getSecondaryColorReadonly()

      • isVisibleThroughTerrain

        boolean isVisibleThroughTerrain()
        Returns:
        true if getSecondaryColorReadonly() is non-null.
